trans-unit.source: Provides credential settings for a secure conversation service.
trans-unit.target: 提供安全对话服务的凭据设置。

trans-unit.source: Secure conversations involve the exchange of multiple messages and use a Security Context Token (SCT) to ensure security.
trans-unit.target: 安全对话涉及到多条消息的交换，并且使用安全上下文令牌 (SCT) 来确保安全性。

trans-unit.source: The SCT is shared among the communicating parties for the lifetime of a communications session.
trans-unit.target: 在通信会话的整个生存期内，通信各方将共享 SCT。

trans-unit.source: A service can issue two different kinds of SCTs:
trans-unit.target: 一个服务可以颁发两种不同类型的 SCT：

trans-unit.source: The first is a session-based SCT that contains a unique id. Messages carry only the id, and the service maintains a state-mapping cache that maps between the SCT ids and contents (such as claims, security keys, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 第一种是基于会话的 SCT，其包含唯一 ID。消息只携带 ID，而服务会维护 SCT ID 与内容（如声明、安全密钥等）之间映射的状态映射缓存。

trans-unit.source: A well-behaved client must send an SCT cancellation to help the service optimize the cache resources.
trans-unit.target: 功能良好的客户端必须发送 SCT 取消，以帮助服务优化缓存资源。

trans-unit.source: If you instantiate this class by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.CreateSecureConversationBindingElement%2A> with the `requireCancellation` parameter equal to `true`, the SCT is issued in this manner.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.CreateSecureConversationBindingElement%2A> 参数等于 `requireCancellation` 的 `true` 来实例化此类，则会以这种方式颁发 SCT。

trans-unit.source: The second is a self-contained SCT that resides in a cookie on the client.
trans-unit.target: 第二种是独立的 SCT，其位于客户端的 Cookie 中。

trans-unit.source: This SCT contains the entire state information, so requires neither state management from the service nor SCT cancellation from the client.
trans-unit.target: 这种 SCT 包含整个状态信息，因此，既不需要服务管理状态，也不需要客户端取消 SCT。

trans-unit.source: This is sometimes called a "cookie-mode" SCT.
trans-unit.target: 有时称为“Cookie 模式”的 SCT。

trans-unit.source: Because the SCT contains the entire state information, its size is larger than in the session-based case.
trans-unit.target: 由于该 SCT 包含整个状态信息，因此，其大小要比基于会话的类型大。

trans-unit.source: With session-based SCTs, the service stores much of the state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于会话的 SCT，服务可以存储大量状态信息。

trans-unit.source: However, because it is self-contained, it can be used across service lifetime and persists across service shutdown and restart.
trans-unit.target: 不过，第二种类型是独立的，因此它可以用于整个服务生存期，而且在服务关闭和重新启动期间仍持续存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> claims for cookie serialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于 Cookie 序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> claims for cookie serialization.
trans-unit.target: 用于 Cookie 序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: To serialize claims into SCT cookies, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] uses <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> as the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 将声明序列化为 SCT Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Because the Claim resource is extensible, WCF allows you to provide a list of known resource types.
trans-unit.target: 由于声明资源是可扩展的因此 WCF 可以提供已知的资源类型的列表。

trans-unit.source: This assists the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> during deserialization of the claims in the cookie so that it can return the original strongly-typed objects.
trans-unit.target: 这对 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 在反序列化 Cookie 中的声明过程中返回原始强类型对象有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to get this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何获取此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a customized <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder" /> for encoding and decoding cookie serialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于对 Cookie 序列化进行编码和解码的自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder" /> object, which is a customization of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder" /> 对象，它是自定义的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder" />。

trans-unit.source: In "cookie mode", a service issues the client a security context token (SCT) in the form of a cookie to the client so that it does not have to maintain any security state.
trans-unit.target: 在“Cookie 模式”中，服务会以 Cookie 形式向客户端颁发安全上下文令牌 (SCT)，如此一来，服务就无需维护任何安全状态。

trans-unit.source: The client sends the cookie back in the request message so that the service knows how to unprotect and verify the request message.
trans-unit.target: 客户端会在请求消息中将 Cookie 发送回去，如此一来，服务就会了解如何取消对请求消息的保护以及如何对其进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Because the SCT is often transmitted over a non-secure network, it must be protected.
trans-unit.target: 由于通常在不安全的网络上传输 SCT，所以必须对其加以保护。

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder> class to protect the cookie using the Data Protection API (DPAPI).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会通过数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder> 类对 Cookie 进行保护。

trans-unit.source: For DPAPI to work in a Web farm environment, all the backend services must run as the same domain user account.
trans-unit.target: 若要让 DPAPI 在网络场环境中发挥作用，所有后端服务都必须使用相同的域用户帐户运行。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the service is Web hosted, then the Internet Information Services (IIS) worker process must be configured to run as a domain user.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，如果服务是 Web 承载的类型，则必须将 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 辅助进程配置为以域用户身份运行。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to use a customized <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder> to encrypt and decrypt the cookie and not depend on DPAPI.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以使用自定义的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityStateEncoder> 对 Cookie 进行加密和解密，而不依赖 DPAPI。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何设置此属性。
